snippet.title: The Flintstones: Bedrock Racing - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Released in 2007, this was another racing game based on The Flintstones. Unlike Viva Rock Vegas, it's based on the original cartoons. Bedrock Racing is developed by Coyote Console, who developed Mr. Bean and Agent Hugo: Lemoon Twist. In fact, the game has similarities with the other Hanna-Barbera based PS2 game, Wacky Races: Mad Motors. Like Viva Rock Vegas, this was only released in PAL regions, in that case Europe and Australia.

The Flintstones (C) Warner Bros. Discovery
Blast! Entertainment (C) Mastertronic
